title: Aurora Brand Systems
summary: From fragmented visuals to a cohesive identity & motion language for an AI firm.
story: Audit and narrative distillation aligned execs on one story.
Developed a generative grid, typographic rhythm, and motion grammar.
Rolled out across product, web, and launch film toolkits.

title: Generative Poster Engine
summary: Parametric posters at scale using seeded randomness and typographic rules.
story: Built a shape grammar with constrained palettes for identity coherence.
Enabled teams to iterate hundreds of variations quickly without losing craft.

title: Health UI Kit
summary: Accessible, modular components across web & mobile for a health platform.
story: Tokenized color and type; Figma libraries; coded reference components.
Reduced context-switching and brought consistency across teams.
